value.title: Microsoft Unveils Cloud Tools Tailored for Health-Care Systems
value.excerpt: Microsoft Corp. unveiled a package of cloud software designed for health-care systems, starting with a free trial to help the industry weather a viral pandemic that is both increasing the need for technology solutions and putting hospitals in financial peril.

value.title: Sony and Microsoft team up on AI-powered cameras
